title: Aboard the ISS: A Day in Space
theme: Understanding daily life for astronauts on the International Space Station.

panels.scene_description: The Hero, Mentor, and Companion stand before a holographic projection of the International Space Station, orbiting Earth.

dialogue.text: Whoa! The International Space Station! But how do astronauts evenâ€¦ live up there?
An excellent question, my boy! It's quite different from life on Earth. Let's take a closer look.
(Muffled from Hero's pocket) Squeak! Does... does that mean space snacks?

panels.narrative_text: The Hero wonders about the realities of life aboard the ISS. The Mentor prepares to explain.
panels.visual_focus: Holographic ISS, Earth in background, characters looking up in awe. Hamster peeks from Hero's pocket.

panels.scene_description: Inside the ISS, the characters float in a simulated zero-gravity environment. The Mentor points to an astronaut using bungee cords to exercise on a treadmill.

dialogue.text: First, they must exercise rigorously! Without gravity, their muscles and bones would weaken. See how she's using the bungee cords?
Wow! So, they need to work out every day just to stay healthy? What about eating?
Squeak! Food! I hope it's not just space carrots!

panels.narrative_text: The Mentor explains the importance of exercise in space. The Companion is concerned about the menu.
panels.visual_focus: Interior of ISS, astronaut exercising with bungee cords. Floating food packages are visible. Hamster looks worried.

panels.scene_description: The characters observe astronauts preparing a meal. Food pouches float, and they use straws to drink. The Mentor points to a recycling system.

dialogue.text: They're eating... from pouches? And drinking with straws? That looks tricky!
Indeed! Food is specially prepared to be lightweight and easy to consume in zero gravity. And see that complex system? They recycle water and air to conserve resources. Every drop counts!
Squeak! Recycle! Good for the planet... and maybe more room for snacks?

panels.narrative_text: The Hero learns about specialized food and resource management in space. The Companion sees a potential benefit.
panels.visual_focus: Astronauts eating from pouches, recycling system visible. Hamster looks thoughtful.

panels.scene_description: Back in front of the holographic ISS, the characters are smiling. The Hero holds his staff confidently.

dialogue.text: So, living on the ISS is all about careful planning, constant exercise, and resourcefulness! It's hard work!
Precisely! But the research and discoveries they make are invaluable. They push the boundaries of human knowledge.
Squeak! Space is hard... but space snacks make it better!

panels.narrative_text: The Hero understands the challenges and rewards of life on the ISS. The Mentor is pleased with the lesson.
panels.visual_focus: Holographic ISS again, characters smiling. Hamster peeks out, cheeks stuffed. Hero holds staff with determination.
